oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Genji monogatari
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Murasaki Shikibu, b. 978?
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: text_and_corpus_linguistics
Fiction -- Japan -- 11th century
Novels -- Japan -- 11th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An epic novel concerning the life and intrigues of the fictitional Prince Genji, who is the son of the emperor and Kiritsubo, his concubine. The Tale is generally regarded as an accurate portrayal of aristocratic life in the middle of the Heian period (794-1195 A.D.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Oxford Text Archive, University of Oxford
